Most Excellent Sir

By order of His Excellency Sir Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Most Excellent Sir General João Antônio da Silveira. Headquarters at Bagé, October 18, 1841. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff

Presidency of the Republic Secretariat To the citizen General João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the 1st Army Corps. Wherever he may be. From the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff. Official letter from the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff, dated October 18, received on [date illegible], regarding order of the day no. 78.
